title: Bug 121682: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description: Exception is thrown when exporting data from the attached report.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table containing highlight and map rules, an exception is thrown.
EB: No exception should be thrown when exporting data from a table with highlight and map rules; the export process should proceed without errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a table to the report that includes a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export data from the table with highlight and map rules.
